songs.title: Can’t Stop Loving You
songs.lyrics:
(intro)
Yeah, yes
Frrr
Cassius
(Dat Boy Cassius)

(Hook)

No matter how hard I try
I can’t stop loving you
No matter how many rings I buy
I’m still gonna wait for you
Ouu
There’s no escaping you
Your love is really pure
Loved me when I was in the dirt
I can’t go no where!

(Verse 1)

Crrr, I’m a multimillionaire but with this —— (crrrr)
You sweet like a fruit baby
I will never disappear
—— ???
Clinch like a bear
Girl I don’t wanna let go, no no no no no

(Bridge)
Never let a hoe between us
It’s a different kind of love
It’s a difference between L U V & L O V E
If not then tell me why

(Hook)

No matter how hard I try
I can’t stop loving you
No matter how many rings I buy
I’m still gonna wait for you
Ouu
There’s no escaping you
Your love is really pure
Loved me when I was in the dirt
I can’t go no where!
Hrrrrr
Even if, even if I try
This love can’t go nowhere
I try
This love can’t go nowhere
My heart can’t go no where
I can’t go no where
I’m not going no where

(Verse 2)

Wrrrr
Wave GPS couldn’t find these feelings
Girl I need that sexual healing
Media play around
Not square as how it sound
No tell em the truth
That’s word around town
I need more than sex prrr
I need more than a text hrrr
Uma ride by
Debo how I flex
Pan out like ????
Double G on ya I guess it
All them Rolling Stones on your neck
That I bought is getting reckless
Promise you

(Bridge)

Never let a hoe between us
It’s a different kind of love
It’s a difference between L U V & L O V E
If not then tell me why

(Hook)

No matter how hard I try
I can’t stop loving you
No matter how many rings I buy
I’m still gonna wait for you
Ouu
There’s no escaping you
Your love is really pure
Loved me when I was in the dirt
I can’t go no where!
Hrrrrr
Even if, even if I try
This love can’t go nowhere
I try
This love can’t go nowhere
My heart can’t go no where
I can’t go no where
I’m not going no where
